ClaimId__c.description: ID of the claim that this record is related to.

ClaimStatusId__c.description: ID of the claim status that this record is related to.

From__c.description: Service start date for claim line.

Location__c.description: Location details of the place where service was performed.

LocationCode__c.description: Location code of the place where service was performed.

Name__c.description: Name of the claim line record.

NDCCode__c.description: Drug code as defined in the National Drug Code (NDC).

ProcedureCPTHCPCSId__c.description: Service procedure code based on Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) or Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS).

RenderingProvider__c.description: The National Provider Identifier (NPI) of the rendering provider associated with this service.

RevenueCode__c.description: Revenue grouping code associated with the claim line.

SourceSystem__c.description: Name of the system that this record was sourced from.

SourceSystemIdentifier__c.description: ID of the system that this record was sourced from.

SourceSystemModified__c.description: Timestamp of the most recent update from the source system

To__c.description: Service end date for claim line.

Unit__c.description: Number of units of service or drug provided to the patient.
